level.text: A limited cooperative association may amend its organic rules under this subchapter for any lawful purpose. In addition, the initial board of directors may amend the bylaws of an association under ยง 29-1003.04.

Unless the organic rules otherwise provide, a member shall not have a vested property right resulting from any provision in the organic rules, including a provision relating to the management, control, capital structure, distribution, entitlement, purpose, or duration of the limited cooperative association.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 401 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
